item.title: How to Perform Effective Web3 Penetration Testing-Gathering Information (1)
item.description: In the web2 world, we often hear statements like this: “If you want to discover more vulnerabilities during penetration testing, collecting information is the first and most crucial step.” This is no exception in the penetration testing of the web3 world.
